title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-1.9 - Condemned boilers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-1.9 - Condemned boilers

State Regulations

Any boiler that has been recommended for condemnation
shall be immediately discontinued from service. The commissioner shall be
promptly notified of such action and shall reinspect the boiler for final
action. Boilers that have been condemned shall have distinctly stamped
thereon: Image
in a location as specified in section
14-9.43
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-1.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
